description:
iTechArt Group is looking for a Java Team Lead for challenging and interesting projects for USA-based accounts. You will get a chance to participate in project development for a wide range of companies. From technology incubators and startups to Fortune 500 firms. Your ability to travel to US is a big plus.

Type: Full-time permanent position

 

Required skills/competencies:

  • Experience as a Team Lead or Architect (2+ years)
  • 5+ years of experience with Java Core and J2EE (EJB, JSP, JMS), XML/XSLT, Web Services
  • Proven experience in commercial web applications development
  • Good knowledge of Patterns/OOP Practices, Spring Framework, Hibernate, Struts, JUnit, Maven
  • Excellent interpersonal, organizational, and written/verbal communications skills
  • Upper intermediate level of English (spoken, written)
  • Customer communication experience
  • Education: BS, MS in Computer technologies or similar

Additional Requirements:

  • International experience (a plus)
name: Java Team Lead
